page.title: 22RECREATION IN SPRATTON AREA
page.content: The football club use the recreational playing field for home games and training. Its club house (and changing rooms) is also home to a Sports and Social Club. Spratton has a thriving allotment society and once a year hold a produce show, open to all villagers, in conjunction with the women's institute. There are also local history and photography groups which meet regularly, as well as a yoga group. Some of these groups meet in the Village Hall. Children are well catered for with brownies, guides, cubs and scouts, which all meet in the Scout Hut in the village. There is a book club, a pottery group, and a wine-tasting society.
